name: Such Much AI
description: Such Much AI is a no-code procurement process AI automation platform. We empower organizations of all sizes to harness the power of AI without needing technical expertise. Our platform enables users to create AI-driven procurement or public tender workflows with a library of prompt templates or our proprietary AI agent based on open-source large language models (LLM).
one_liner: Such Much AI is a no-code procurement process AI automation platform. We empower organizations of all sizes to harness the power of AI without needing technical expertise. Our platform enables users to create AI-driven procurement or public tender workflows with a library of prompt templates or our proprietary AI agent based on open-source large language models (LLM).
